duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in preparation of capital/operating forecasts/budgets, account and trend analysis, and reporting focused on the supported Departments/Business Unit(s).
Provide guidance to leadership on the financial trends and operational drivers behind the results and prepare reports on findings.
Create and/or review financial models with "what if" scenarios to help future business planning decisions and will assist in communicating recommendations to senior management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree Finance, Business Administration, Management, Accounting, Economics, Engineering.
